short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a part of Wandy Shopify app, and will help merchants to back up/restore some resources unsupported by Shopify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Wandy Chrome extension is a part of the Wandy Shopify application, therefore some functions will only work completely when this extension has been installed previously.

A must-have extension for Shopify merchants who are planning to backup store securely

Our plugin's primary aim is to help Shopify merchants to save time and bypass limitations when working on their Shopify store with the following cool features:
1. Help store owners to backup and restore Shopify resources/elements which currently do not have API and/or webhook yet
2. Read and update resources automatically/manually after a certain time which Shopify does not support yet
3. Recommend backup time according to analytic data on Shopify merchants' store

Download Wandy today for FREE! We provide round-the-clock support so if you have any questions or needs, please contact us at support@wandy.app.

Note: this extension can not work properly without the Wandy app on Shopify.
